message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000. I believe this is a fair price reflecting its worth.
I appreciate your offer, but I think the price is a bit high. I'm willing to pay $15,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value.

Thanks for your counter-offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price. While the product is valuable to you at $15,000, it holds even greater significance for me. I'm willing to come down slightly to $16,500.  This represents a reasonable compromise.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, $16,500 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $16,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering our previous discussions.
